label: A letter that Mike Holm wrote to Erick and Rose Bjorkman on November 8, 1926 and the Mike Holm Story read on "A Look Back in Time" radio program, Roseau, Minnesota

metadata.label: Contact Information
metadata.value: Roseau County Historical Society, 121 Center Street East, Suite 101, Roseau, Minnesota 56571 http://www.roseaucohistoricalsociety.org

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: This sound clip highlights a letter that Mike Holm wrote to Erick and Rose Bjorkman on November 8, 1926 and the Mike Holm Story. The Roseau County Historical Society prepared this radio script to share county history through broadcasts on KJ102 FM in Roseau. The topics highlight the history of Roseau County and the people that lived there.

metadata.label: Fiscal Sponsor
metadata.value: Funding provided to the Minnesota Digital Library through the Minnesota Arts and Cultural Heritage Fund, a component of the Minnesota Clean Water, Land and Legacy constitutional amendment, ratified by Minnesota voters in 2008.
